articles.content: Bob Belber and Philip Morris spent Saturday on the phone and on weather apps. Two of the biggest shows of the year at their respective venues a Bruce Springsteen concert at MVP Arena in Albany, where… [+6563 chars]

articles.author: Eddie Makuch
articles.title: The Last Of Us Won't Recast Ellie For Season 2 - GameSpot
articles.description: As it happens, Bella Ramsey is currently the same age as Ellie in The Last of Us Part II.
articles.content:
HBO's The Last of Us series is returning for a second season, and there will be a time jump. But the network is not going to recast actress Bella Ramsey.
Naughty Dog's Neil Druckmann, who is also a … [+1692 chars]
